data.actual_result: Discord ignores the Graphite setting and stays in color
data.expected_result: Discord's window controls switch from green, yellow, and red, to shades of grey and black, as directed in Apple's Human Interface Guidelines
data.short_description: Graphite switching on Mac doesn't take in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Open System Preferences and switch from Blue to Graphite- Open Discord
